fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Competition, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
*Food Safety. ECMA has developed a Food Safety Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) in line with Article 3 of Regulation (EC) No 1935/2004. 
 
* ECMA is focussing on the packaging aspects of the change and implementation of the EU Tobacco Products Directive (TPD2). Various ECMA members produce cigarette packaging and packaging of roll-your-own cigarettes
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Technical expert group for food contact materials#E03354#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3354#Member#C
membership: ECMA is member of Brussels based Paper Converter Association CITPA.
relevant_communication: ECMA organises in the month September a yearly Congress in a European city.
goals__remit: The European Carton Makers Association is the official organisation for Folding Carton Producing Companies, National Carton Associations and Suppliers tot the folding carton industry throughout Europe. The association is constituted to serve the interest of the European folidng carton industry in general and the international co-operation within the industry in the widest sense.
